description.value:
Requirements You successfully avoid an attack with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.2ORcBQibJPXCHyiJ]{Third Eye}

You exploit your opponent's weakness and take revenge. Until the end of your turn, your opponent is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against your attacks. Furthermore, you can Strike the target. This Strike does not count in your multiple attack penalty, but does end @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}.

Special This ability cannot be used at the same time as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.ycmxVkoD151gRO7K]{Seigan}.
